metadata.synopsis: A sharran cultist speculating about what is going to happen after Viconia's defeat.

0.speaker: Sharran Novice Dollay
0.text: This may prove to be a mistake, I fear. A dreadful mistake.
0.context: NodeContext: Concerned, Thinking out loud to self in the aftermath of a coup attempt against the Shar Cult, in which she threw her lot in with the instigators and helped defeat the leader. Now experiencing some doubts

1.speaker: Sharran Novice Dollay
1.text: What if Lady Shar still supported the Mother Superior? What if we were misled?
1.context: NodeContext: Concerned, Thinking out loud to self in the aftermath of a coup attempt against the Shar Cult, in which she threw her lot in with the instigators and helped defeat the leader. Now experiencing some doubts

2.speaker: Sharran Novice Dollay
2.text: But... she didn't aid us either. Not in any way I comprehended...
2.context: NodeContext: Concerned, Thinking out loud to self in the aftermath of a coup attempt against the Shar Cult, in which she threw her lot in with the instigators and helped defeat the leader. Now experiencing some doubts

3.speaker: Sharran Novice Dollay
3.text: No... surely the Dark Lady would have aided the Mother Superior, had that been true.
3.context: NodeContext: Concerned, Thinking out loud to self in the aftermath of a coup attempt against the Shar Cult, in which she threw her lot in with the instigators and helped defeat the leader. Now experiencing some doubts
